level.heading: Second degree child sexual abuse.
level.text: Whoever, being at least 4 years older than a child, engages in sexual contact with that child or causes that child to engage in sexual contact shall be imprisoned for not more than 10 years and, in addition, may be fined in an amount not more than the amount set forth in § 22-3571.01.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Sentencing, supervised release, and good time credit for felonies committed on or after August 5, 2000, see § 24-403.01.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 23-113 and § 24-112.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-317 substituted "not more than the amount set forth in § 22-3571.01" for "in an amount not to exceed $100,000".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-257
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-257, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-3001.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-317: Section 401 of D.C. Law 19-317 provided that the act shall apply only to offenses committed on or after June 11, 2013.
